alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 8:01AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON...OSWEGO...AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue this morning east of Lake Ontario, across southern Jefferson and far northern Oswego counties, extending inland across the Tug Hill in western Lewis County. This band of snow will continue to drift slowly south through mid morning. Snowfall rates of 2 to 3 inches per hour are likely in this band. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Carthage, Lowville, Pulaski, Adams, Adams Center, Barnes Corners, Highmarket, Richland, Denmark, New Bremen, Watson, Martinsburg, Henderson, and Rodman. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 44. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
